document.topic_text: Party pahnihin Candidate nei Aizawla local council pathuma August 26, 2016-a bye-election neih turah Congress leh MNF-te chiahin candidate an siam a, party dangin candidate an dah lo. Chhinga Veng, Chite leh Mission Venga LC bye-election turah hian nimin khan hming pe lutte inhnuhdawh theih ni hnuhnung a ni a, inhnûkdâwk an awm lo. Chhinga Veng leh Chite Veng chu general seat a ni a, Mission Vengah hmei­chhia thlan tur a ni thung. Candidate-te chu nimin khan an party symbol pangngai pek an ni. Share this Post
